body.p: Consequently, when an entity reclassifies an asset (or disposal group) directly from held for sale to held for distribution to owners (or vice versa), the Board decided to clarify that such a reclassification shall not be treated as a change to a plan of sale (or distribution to owners) and an entity shall not follow the guidance in paragraphs 27–29 of IFRS 5 to account for this change.
